services.name: Suitable fishing areas
services.description: Providing maps of suitable habitat for small pelagic fish, and associated background information.  This information enables the fishermen to increase catches, reduce unwanted bycatch and to save fuel. For further information, click

services.name: Fronts detection
services.description: Providing maps of frontal areas, based on sea surface temperature and chlorophyll a concentrations, to identify suitable habitat for small pelagic fish. This information enables the fishermen to increase catches, reduce unwanted bycatch and to save fuel. For further information, click

services.name: Marine conditions
services.description: Providing shellfish farmers information about marine conditions at their farming sites, which will support them with scheduling their daily operations and planning and reducing associated costs. For further information, click

services.name: Land Pollution
services.description: Enabling shellfish farmers to evaluate the risk of harmful discharges reaching their farm sites, providing lead time to take action and reduce costs associated with spill events. For further information, click

draw_polygon.text: Specify discharge location on the map
draw_polygon.title: Discharge location

services.name: Site prospection
services.description: Supporting shellfish farmers with to identify suitable new sites for oyster production, or to optimize existing ones, in order to increase yield and revenue. For further information, click

services.name: Spat captures assistance
services.description: Enabling shellfish farmers to forecast spat arrival times, providing lead time to optimize the installation of the spat collectors. For further information, click

draw_polygon.text: Select your farming area of interest by drawing it on the map
draw_polygon.title: Farming area
